task_description: Add date validation to Create Project dialog - form currently lacks validation for start/end date fields, allowing users to submit invalid date ranges (end date before start date).

patterns.validation_function_pattern: Validation functions return string | null (error message or null if valid). Functions accept the value and fieldName for error messages. Early return pattern: return null if value is empty/undefined (optional fields).
patterns.form_validation_aggregation: Use logical OR (||) to chain multiple validation rules for a single field. First failing validation returns its error message, stopping further checks.
patterns.error_display_pattern: Use error={!!errors.fieldName} to convert error string to boolean. Use helperText={errors.fieldName || 'default hint'} to show error or helpful hint. MUI TextField automatically styles error state.

existing_implementations.description: Complete validation infrastructure exists in validation.ts with validateRequired, validateMinLength, validateMaxLength, validateCode functions. ProjectsPage.tsx already displays errors for name, code, description, address fields (lines 319-363).
